name: BattleRoom
description:
Welcome to BattleRoom!

Controls: WASD and Mouse, TAB to cycle team ships in-game

Destroy and outmaneuver your opponents as you blast your way to victory!

This is version 0.4.1

New in 0.4.1

  1. Major performance improvements
  2. AI Improvements

New in 0.4.0

  1. Performance Improvements
  2.  New game mode: Whipeout
  3.  Music and Sound FX
  4. New structure to the game setup screen
